11#include "rtc_base/log_sinks.h"
12
13#include <string.h>
14
15#include <cstdio>
16#include <string>
17
18#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
19
20namespace rtc {
21
22FileRotatingLogSink::FileRotatingLogSink(const std::string& log_dir_path,
23 const std::string& log_prefix,
24 size_t max_log_size,
25 size_t num_log_files)
26 : FileRotatingLogSink(new FileRotatingStream(log_dir_path,
27 log_prefix,
28 max_log_size,
29 num_log_files)) {}
30
31FileRotatingLogSink::FileRotatingLogSink(FileRotatingStream* stream)
32 : stream_(stream) {
33 RTC_DCHECK(stream);
34}
35
36FileRotatingLogSink::~FileRotatingLogSink() {}
37
38void FileRotatingLogSink::OnLogMessage(const std::string& message) {
39 if (!stream_->IsOpen()) {
40 std::fprintf(stderr, "Init() must be called before adding this sink.\n");
41 return;
42 }
43 stream_->Write(message.c_str(), message.size());
44}
45
46void FileRotatingLogSink::OnLogMessage(const std::string& message,
47 LoggingSeverity sev,
48 const char* tag) {
49 if (!stream_->IsOpen()) {
50 std::fprintf(stderr, "Init() must be called before adding this sink.\n");
51 return;
52 }
53 stream_->Write(tag, strlen(tag));
54 stream_->Write(": ", 2);
55 stream_->Write(message.c_str(), message.size());
56}
57
58bool FileRotatingLogSink::Init() {
59 return stream_->Open();
60}
61
62bool FileRotatingLogSink::DisableBuffering() {
63 return stream_->DisableBuffering();
64}
65
66CallSessionFileRotatingLogSink::CallSessionFileRotatingLogSink(
67 const std::string& log_dir_path,
68 size_t max_total_log_size)
69 : FileRotatingLogSink(
70 new CallSessionFileRotatingStream(log_dir_path, max_total_log_size)) {
71}
72
73CallSessionFileRotatingLogSink::~CallSessionFileRotatingLogSink() {}
74
75} // namespace rtc
76
